analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The reverse order of the dependent origination, the text of the Paṭṭhāna in triplets and couplets
The Triad of the Wholesome, the Dyad of the Sense-desire Sphere

original: Nakusalaṁ nakāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽(Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na kusalam na kāmāvacaram dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ kāmāvacaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate pañca
translated: With a wholesome sense-desire-sphere state as condition, an unwholesome sense-desire-sphere state arises, a condition being by way of root condition.

original: Nakusalaṁ nanakāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalam na na kāmāvacaram dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ na kāmāvacaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
